QuestData.Title: The Shadows of Skettis
QuestData.Description: My people flee our homeland in droves. I sell trinkets to ease the journey.$B$BBut I see that you are not interested in trinkets... No, what you seek are answers.$B$BSkettis lies just ahead. Once a great city built by Terokk as a refuge for the unwanted. Now a ruined slum.$B$BAn old storyteller lives there - a scrollkeeper named Reshad. Find him and speak these words: "Shadows gather." He will know you are a friend.$B$BNow go. Your presence is bad for business.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak the password to Reshad in Skettis.
QuestData.RewardText: Azik must have seen something in you. I will trust his judgment, for n-$B$B<Reshad is interrupted as a warm gust of wind surges through the hut.>$B$BOh dear... they've arrived.
